comments.author: gacob.1759
comments.body: I talk about “points” field in the previous leaderboard for season 1 pvp(I called it “old”).

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: How old are we talking? We should be able to expose the Season 1 standings (division/pips) but anything earlier than that is going to be a bit more work. The game histories are already dumped out via /v2/pvp/games, but due to our retention policies we can only save the last ten games, so anything older than that is lost (there’s a variety of sites that will save your game history for you).

comments.author: gacob.1759
comments.body: Didn’t you save the data of the Old PvP Ranking(in Leaderboards)?

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Hoping to have it ready around the start of Season 2. Here’s the github issue.

I’m not planning on exposing the predicted win/loss % or per-match pip loss/gain, but it will expose your current division/pips/etc.

comments.author: gacob.1759
comments.body:
Where is the old PvP Ranking API?
I mean to the old pvp ranking with the points(pips), victory, lose and w/l %. I see useful for do an idea of the players in each division.
Thanks ^^.
